platform.flamingo.themes.home.title=Flamingo témy. platform.flamingo.themes.home.currenttheme=Aktuálna Téma platform.flamingo.themes.home.otherthemes=Ďalšie dostupné Témy ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.warningOldColorThemeInstalled=This is the application to manage the Flamingo Themes. A Flamingo Theme is a customizable variation of any skin based on Flamingo. If you want to manage Color Themes for Colibri-based skins, you should go to {0}Colibri Color Themes Application{1}. ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.warningCurrentOldColorTheme=The current Theme is a Colibri Color Theme which is not optimized to work with a skin based on Flamingo. We have tried our best to make it compatible, but the results might not be optimal. platform.flamingo.themes.home.useThisTheme=Použiť tému platform.flamingo.themes.home.newThemeName=Názov témy… platform.flamingo.themes.home.create=Vytvoriť novú tému platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.invalid=Neplatný názov\! ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.csrf=For security reasons, please confirm that you want to create a Theme called "{0}". platform.flamingo.themes.home.create.confirm=Potvrdiť platform.flamingo.themes.home.set.success=Téma "{0}" bola nastavená. platform.flamingo.themes.title.variables=Premenné platform.flamingo.themes.title.preview=Náhľad platform.flamingo.themes.autorefresh=Obnoviť automaticky platform.flamingo.themes.refresh=Obnoviť ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.refreshwarning=The refresh can take several seconds. platform.flamingo.themes.loading=Načítava sa... platform.flamingo.themes.category.logos=Logá platform.flamingo.themes.category.base-colors=Základné farby ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.typography=Typography platform.flamingo.themes.category.forms=Formuláre platform.flamingo.themes.category.buttons=Tlačidlá ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.tables=Tables ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.navbar=Navigation Bar ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.dropdowns=Drop downs platform.flamingo.themes.category.panels=Panely ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.category.breadcrumb=Breadcrumb platform.flamingo.themes.category.advanced=Pokročilý platform.flamingo.themes.defaultvalue=Preddefinovaný ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.lessCode.description=In this field, you can directly write LESS code which will be added into the skin. ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.local=Local ### Missing: platform.flamingo.themes.global=Global
